lender.name: Terri & girls
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world." Mahatma Gandhi I want to be a good example to my daughters.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an ad agency help clients put together media strategies to best reach their clients.

lender.name: Stephen and Dawn
lender.loan_because: All humanity sees through 2 eyes, breathes through 2 lungs and feels though one spirit. We are all equal in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Hospital helping people with emergency medical problems

lender.name: RJKK
lender.loan_because: "The King replied "Whenever you did it for any of my people, you did it for me."

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe people are supposed to help others in whatever ways possible.
lender.occupational_info: I do not work any more due to a variety of medical problems. Family and friends helped me through periods when I had no income, and now I am doing what I can to help others in need.

lender.name: Charisse
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate and discovered an amazing community which provides a rare service: person-to-person micro-lending opportunities. Often times I wonder how I can help those who want to gain financial independence and Kiva allows me to do this.

lender.name: I & P
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all equal In the eyes of God. We should be able to lean on each other in hard times insted of a government institution. From my travels and experiences in third world countries handing out money and supplies dose not work. If those in need are a part and have ownership these dreams listed have a chance.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: My husband is working in the middle East, and he always tells me personal stories about people that live there. I felt this was a way to reach out to them.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of a house, a husband, and two children 24 hours a day.

lender.name: taheerah
lender.loan_because: i believe it's what GOD wants us all to do. it's not the size of the loan that counts, but the size of your heart.
lender.occupational_info: keeping up with 4 teens, a 5 year old, a husband, and 3 pets is alot of work.

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: These folk deserve and chance.

lender.name: Victoria and Family
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed by others helping us through out our lives and career and would like to extend the same type of opportunities to other.
lender.occupational_info:
My husband and I and another woman own a software company. Our company develops and sells software which helps companies move data between different applications.
We love owning our company and setting our direction. When our children were small, having our own company that allowed us to work and still be heavily involved in our childrens' lives and activities.
We hope that through these small loans that you will be able to acheive success and your dreams.

lender.name: T.D. KHUONG
lender.loan_because: "You make a living by what you get. You make a life by what you give." - Winston Churchill.
lender.occupational_info: Live life at its fullest. I Live, I Work, I Loan!

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it's an easy and very effective way to help others help themselves. I like being able to partner with Christian-based organizations, too.
lender.occupational_info: I proofread depositions taken in civil legal cases.

lender.name: Jenn and Dan
lender.loan_because:
We have visited many impoverished countries and saw how difficult life is for those who had to scrape by with only a few dollars a week. The difference between poverty in the developing and developed world is enormous.
* Almost half the world — over three billion people — live on less than $2.50 a day. * 25,000 children die each day due to poverty *1.6 billion people — a quarter of humanity — live without electricity From www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats

lender.name: Johnine, Steve & Ava
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Dez
lender.loan_because: I like to help others. I can afford to do so and lastly, I like the idea of giving someone a hand rather then a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: A student of economics and a fellow philosopher, a wife to one, a mother to four,and a friend to many.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people and what better way to help someone than to help them help themselves.

lender.name: Dayne wood
lender.loan_because: its cool

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have seen that all a small amount of money can change someones life. They just need the chance to prove themselves and I want to give them that chance.

lender.name: Kristoffer
lender.loan_because: It's a personal choice.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer by profession, but have been practicing the skill in different industries from entertainment to broadcasting. I currently write for several websites and publications

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that works with adults with developmental disabilities. I am the community living scheduler... I ensure there's staffing in the homes for my program and supervise the subs that work for us as well. I also am attending school, working on my degree in Health Care Administration

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I believe a rising tide raises all boats, and that everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I check the work of our customer service team to make sure their spelling, grammar, and answers are correct.

lender.name: No.1 Ladies Safari Club
lender.loan_because: We travel to many places around the world and want to give back to the people who live there.
lender.occupational_info: We work to promote conservation of wildlife and habitats worldwide through accredited aquariums and zoos in North America and Asia.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting people through influence and persuasion.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it's the future.
lender.occupational_info: I help recent immigrants and refugees obtain settlement services in Canada

lender.name: ruby and me
lender.loan_because: it is fun!
lender.occupational_info: work in industrial safety

lender.name: Colter
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help solve problems for companies and governments

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: I love

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help make electricity.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship provides freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I help philanthropists invest their money in charitable organizations which improve the human condition in areas important to my clients and their families. I work with organizations to improve their effectiveness in realizing their mission.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: i like to help people that need help.

lender.name: Christy
lender.occupational_info: I work in the athletic footwear industry (product creation).

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I want to put my money where my mouth is! What happens to someone 10,000 miles away matters to me.

lender.name: Mae Jennifer
lender.occupation: Higher Education (I work at a University)
lender.loan_because: I want to pass on the support and generosity that has been extended to me.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to create employment for themselves and live well.
lender.occupational_info: I make beautiful websites that are accessible to all.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I read books, listen to lectures, and try to get my homework done. :) And I work...

lender.name: Karly
lender.occupational_info: I am an American teacher living in Ecuador.

lender.name: Michelle Marie
lender.loan_because: It's a profound turn-on to be able to empower others in this way. Kiva is the QVC of philanthropy...and more satisfying. I loan because we're all here to help each other ....we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I own two self-storage businesses and some investment properties. I know how much work and faith it takes to make your dream a reality. I wish you much success and joy with your business venture!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to lend to others. I am happy to help others in their business ventures.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in the buying and selling of homes.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is the responsibility of every human being to give oneself to their community in whatever way they can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students how to think critically and write persuasively so that they can positively impact communities locally, nationally, and internationally.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe that our similarities are greater than our differences.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I was given the Kiva credit as a wedding gift from a friend, my fiancee and I are very glad to be given the opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Very rewarding but sometimes frusterating

lender.name: Bryn & Lochlan
lender.loan_because: We're learning to help others and about different places in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We like making people smile.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: This seems a splendid initiative to help people to get a happy life in their own country.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired, so I enjoy my hobbies.

lender.name: Joe and Kathy
lender.occupation: I am a Police Officer and Kathy is a secretary
lender.loan_because: I felt a calling to do something like this. I will see how it works and possibly do more when I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I am an honest and hard working public servant.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Throughout my travels through Africa and the Middle East, I have met many deserving entrepreneurs. Getting to know these people individually has helped me to appreciate their circumstances and their drive to succeed. Lending through Kiva is a small way by which I can impact the lives of strangers in a positive way to show there are people out there who care about them.

lender.name: Madeleine
lender.loan_because: This must be the ultimate way to make a difference. My money will help people again and again...
lender.occupational_info: I work in health care in southern Sweden.

lender.name: Chee Yong
lender.loan_because: there's something dismal about a society that operates by the survival of the richest, and the poorest be damned.
lender.occupational_info: I help organization to design and optimize enterprise-wide business process ready to be adopted across business units and IT solutions.

lender.name: lasse
lender.loan_because: so much hope. and love
lender.occupational_info: working..like you too...

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: all you need is love!
lender.occupational_info: language, food, wine and travel teacher

lender.name: SLBC Ink
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can.

lender.name: Anja
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, to become successfull, by doing hardwork - and earn their own money, so they can come out off powerty in a good respectfull way.
lender.occupational_info: I develop concepts in terms of changing deep beleifs and feelings quick, easy to good and rewardfull energies, that will bring you success in the future, wether its private, jobrelated or in other relations

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: because it is great to help other people
lender.occupational_info: lots of internet work in europe

lender.name: Luke
lender.occupation: Attorney by day, Rock and Roll Diety by night
lender.loan_because: It's fun, it's easy, and it feels good. What more do ya need?
lender.occupational_info: I represent regular people who have been harmed by the carelessness of others in the American justice system.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I know that it is one way to help others directly and have a positive impact on the world. One person at a time can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help young adults who are disabled learn the skills they will need to live on their own.

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to many of these countries and see the true needs that exist there.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have had medical problems to get their joints, bones, muscles, heart or lungs into better shape.

lender.name: Ag7 (Mr. Homburg)
lender.loan_because: To learn about and connect with people around the world
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I'm a pre-service social studies teacher at Indiana University. In the fall, I will be student teaching roughly 90 students about world geography. My goal is to use Kiva with students to make learning about the world meaningful on a personal level. Towards this goal, I am getting my feet wet by making my first loan (I'm rooting for you Sokhorn Duch!).

lender.name: CK & LK
lender.loan_because: Glad to help..

lender.name: Joshua Soloway
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a great way to empower others to improve their lives and their communities. Kiva is a wonderful tool because it magnifies the impact of my donations thereby enabling multiple people to benefit from the same donated funds.
lender.occupational_info: My firm, Soloway Group, P.C. Counselors at Law provides outsourced U.S. special counsel services to non-U.S. companies and investors.

lender.name: Annie
lender.occupational_info: I help adult learners achieve their literacy and career goals.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it makes my joy complete. (1 John 1:4)
lender.occupational_info: I preach the good news that Christ died for sins that we might live for Him.

lender.name: maureen
lender.loan_because: This is another opportunity to "make a difference" in a small way. We are all God's people and all have blessings to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others stands the test of time.

lender.name: kristina
lender.loan_because: i love people, and want to see them succeed
lender.occupational_info: i design and build large houses and restaurants

lender.name: Alia
lender.loan_because: Life is a gift and I am so grateful for all that I have.
lender.occupational_info: Being a student is grueling!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe.

lender.name: Philip J. Mutrie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a better world by giving to people who want to build a better and financially free life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer, audio and video systems engineer. I teach my students how to use a computer, add audio and video to their websites and blogs. I offer my students lifetime alumni for I believe that they deserve to grow bigger as I become bigger myself in this lifetime.

lender.name: Riley's Mom
lender.loan_because:
I am filled with a love and compassion for the human spirit that only God could have given me. I have a daughter whom I can support, I want to help other families do the same. Nothing brings you more happiness than creating a world for your child in which they can thrive.
I loan because I have to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a law firm. I am not an associate so my work does not take me into the court room. Rather I help those attorneys prepare for court or depositions by reviewing documents relevant to their case.

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: It feels good!

lender.name: Scott Andrews
lender.loan_because:
enabling those in who have been trapped by generations of unbalanced terms of trade is crucial for a just and sustainable future.
The stories I have been exposed to through this website are inspiring. We must eradicate extreme poverty by 2025 as an act of justice.
In the words of my hero, Martin Luther King: "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere."
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Simon Fraser University studying International Development.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I believe I'm helping someone become self-sufficient, instead of just donating money to them and making them rely on aid.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Georgetown University.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: God has given me such and easy life in terms of our finances. I cannot imagine how I can thank Him properly except to give to His people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm mostly a mom but also do some writing and charity work.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to live where I do and have the resources I have.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer software.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I loan because empowering individuals to improve their own lives can cause a greater shift in a community than just giving to a charity.

lender.name: Peggy T.
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world who are struggling to support their families, educate their children and improve their lives!
lender.occupational_info: Human rights advocate and conscientious objector to all injustice, constantly seeking to expand knowledge, make new friends, promote world peace and save the planet!

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I want to do the right thing
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large hospital in Boston MA

lender.name: BCCHAPTER ADP
lender.loan_because: We raise funds and loan to increase awareness among our members regarding the benefits of micro credit.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of young men attending UBC in Vancouver, BC.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people promote their businesses.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build businesses in food industry
lender.occupational_info: media & technology

lender.occupation: Dan is an architect and Julie is a writer

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: press reader, and part-time university student

lender.name: Etayenesh
lender.loan_because: I could waste that same money doing something pointless or i could loan and help someone improve their live.
lender.occupational_info: i am a scientist but i work on policy issues related to water. i also help my mother run a business in chevy chase, md.

lender.name: NYC Cat Lady
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a helping hand. Having lived in several locations & traveled to many countries I know how fortunate I am. I believe in passing good things onwards.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: I think it is a better way to know what is happening with my money rather that giving it to my bank.
lender.occupational_info: My profession is translator, I have a small translation agency and I usually work for small companies or other agencies.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: the world would be a better place if we all just helped each other out a bit.

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I assist in the administration of pensions for a large reinsurer.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their ability to triumph over adversity. If I can help make that happen...great!

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: its always nice to give to others
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I'm attending Beauty School so that I can become a hair stylist

lender.loan_because: a little can help a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I help people better understand each other - their languages, their style, their cultures

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I have seen injustice around the world and feel that loaning even the smallest amount can help. I see loaning as a way to start the ripple affect for progress.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student at Colorado State Univeristy. My concentration is in Latin American studies, Spanish and Anthropology. I work in a restaurant to earn money.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: with $25, I could take a friend out to dinner or I could help a woman in a developing nation run a business.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about health.

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: The Holy Name of Jesus

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving people a helping hand one individual at a time CAN change the world. Poverty is not acceptable.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: i want to help people that need money to have a successful life.

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to do so and I would want someone to to the same for me if they could.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student at a small school in Ohio.

lender.name: Ash Grove--Mark & Steven

lender.occupational_info: We own vacation cabins and campground in the mountains of Western North Carolina

lender.occupational_info: I train future medical providers.

lender.name: Georgie
lender.loan_because: I love this concept. We are all connected. Improving one person's life improves my own and that of everyone else. I have great faith in the potential of the people borrowing the money.
lender.occupational_info: I have retired from education so I can devote myself to travelling and my passion, gardening, as well as speaking and writing about plants and gardens.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I have little, but enough. And enough to share is all one can ask for in life.

lender.loan_because: I loan because i´m in need,
lender.occupational_info: it´s a Cyber Cafe

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I hope to give a helping hand to those who work hard to better their lives and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the production of books used to sell sky scrapers in major U.S.A. cities.

lender.name: mary-jo
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in many ways in my lifetime and it is time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse in a local community hospital.

lender.name: Gwen and Juan
lender.loan_because: we are blessed with a good life and want to help others.

lender.name: Mer

lender.occupational_info: Financial Planner

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupation: Administration work in a Non Profit

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I have immense respect for people who have the work ethic and Courage to invest in their own future. I love how this program gives me the oppurtunity to support them and brings me closer to our worldwide community!

lender.name: H D
lender.loan_because: Regardless of culture, country, or politics, people want to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people and hope I can help them feel good about what they do.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a convenient way to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Cal State Long Beach (www.csulb.edu). My majors are Economics and German Studies. I've spent lots of time in other countries traveling and studying and I hope I will be able to meet someone who's benefited from my loans.

lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people achieve their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the movement of inventory between the USA, Asia and Europe.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Hardworking individuals and families deserve an opportunity to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I appreciate having steady employment that allows me to support my family.

lender.name: adams
lender.loan_because: I know the money is going direct to the people who need it. Helping them to help themselves.

lender.name: Ding
lender.loan_because: people in countries with less developed financial infrastructure should not be disadvantaged because of circumstances...
lender.occupational_info: reduction of poverty

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: Money is abstract. Giving is real. Be the change you wish to see...
lender.occupational_info: Though we often don't think about it, lots of critters make sound under water. Some chatter, some threaten, some sing, and some even use sound to "see". Boats and submarines and oil fields make sounds as well. I study sound in the ocean. But more than anything, I enjoy teaching because I never fail to learn more than I teach .

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write books

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: I am given so much support in my life that I wish to give some of it to others as well

lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to help people around the world have a better life - it's great to see how a little money can make a huge difference

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: I study International Affairs, Spanish and French at Florida State University. I am very involved with leadership and community service activities on campus, and plan to continue interests through my career, somewhere in international development.

lender.name: joki
lender.loan_because: giving back and sharing what we have is very important

lender.name: Robert J
lender.loan_because: I believe if we all contribute and "pay it forward" across the world it will lead all of us to better acceptance of and cross-cultural understanding. After all - no matter where we live - we're all people and should work together to make this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide interim and project-based accounting, financial, fundraising, marketing and operational support services for a diverse group of profit and non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Else
lender.loan_because: I can and I like to help giving people a better life.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: Having travelled in some of the poorer parts of the world I have seen first hand the spirit of people who just want an opportunity to get on in life and make a living for their families. Charitable hand-outs don't do that but giving someone the chance to create their own business and generate an ongoing income does.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT developing software for business and look after computer networks etc.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed as a family that we want other hard working motivated people to be successful and live as well as they can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a radiology department in a community hospital and my husband is an HVAC Engineer. Our children are 14, 8 and almost 3 months old

lender.name: ashley
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and my uncle gave me a Kiva gift certificate for christmas
lender.occupational_info: I am 9 years old. I am in grade three. I live in CANADA. I like to Play soccer ( futbol ).

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone should be given an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on my degree in public and non profit administration with a concentration in budget and finance.

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: I love empowering people to be accountable for their future, and in turn I want to be accountable for our universal problem of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am a recruiter who finds people jobs and assist companies with their hiring needs.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to see how this system works. It seems like a really good idea. The Web is a wonderful tool; it unites us all. Instead of going to war to grab resources, we should be reaching out to each other, making this world a place of peace. The alleviation of poverty through microfinance seems like a really good way to link the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a university; I am the owner of a very small chocolate company (www.sweetearthchocolates.com); and I am president of Project Hope and Fairness (www.projecthopeandfairness.org).

lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunities

lender.occupational_info: We're just kids. We go to school. Learning and playing. Stuff like that.

lender.occupational_info: Working with doctors to help people heal their bodies.

lender.occupational_info: I help prepare legal documents for people who cannot afford a lawyer.

lender.occupational_info: I work to help make sure that public libraries remain a useful, inspiring and free resource that meets the educational and cultural needs of diverse populations.

lender.name: C.O. Shaw&Family
lender.loan_because: we believe in mankind fulfilling their life purpose

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: i think we can change this planet to something better, if we help each other.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel better than almost anything.
lender.occupational_info: I make handcrafted items and sell them to small shops, mostly in the US. My hope is that my work inspires people to do and care more.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I am glad to help entrepreneurs in less advantaged areas of the world than my own
lender.occupational_info: I treat oral diseases of animals. In the picture, I am doing a root canal on an African Wild Dog at the Frankllin Park Zoo in Boston

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: There are nearly eight billion of us on this earth; we were all put here to live together and assist one another.
lender.occupational_info: Communications industry, working with developments in new technology, fiber optics, video phones, and advanced internet capabilities.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: God blesses us so that we may bless others. It's a great way to help someone less fortunate to have an opportunity to rise up and have a go.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer technician, I repair and maintain computers and small business networks.

lender.name: bobette
lender.loan_because: We are all members of the greater natural community each of us lives in. In sharing one receives much more than one gives on many different levels.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I can't stand how there are this many people who need help in the world. I am a very fortunate person, and the least I can do is help these poor people out with their lives. All they ask is for a little money. $25 could make a huge difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Pitty Pat
lender.loan_because: In my travels around our tiny planet and through life I have been consistently humbled by how so many manage to do so much with so little.
lender.occupational_info: As a cat, I am very lucky and never had to hunt for my food. My servant, Jayne Young, grew up in a very poor farming and ranching community in central Texas and remembers the impact a small loan from the local bank made to her family during the drought years.

lender.name: Central Bank of Baugnia
lender.loan_because: We are Baugnia's (Socialist Federal Republic of Baugnia at www.baugnia.org) way of reaching out to the needy around the globe.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students how to manage nongovernmental/nonprofit organizations. My school has the top ranked nonprofit management program in the US. I am very proud of the work my colleagues and students do.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it is everyone's responsibility to help their fellow "man." I believe that we will eliminate poverty through education. Teach a person to help themselves, and you not only give them a source of income, but self esteem as well. "Be the change you wish to see in the world." ~ Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, as well as an assistant Principal (someone who oversees the daily operations of the school).

lender.name: John

lender.occupational_info: like Acupuncture, but with tuning forks tuned to the Music of the Spheres (Pythagoras), or octave harmonic frequencies made by the planets as they go about their orbits.
